2022-10-01.reason: The current merge group for the repository's default branch, the branch argument is now a no-op
The fixReason field is being removed. You can still use fixedAt and dismissReason.
PRs are removed from the merge queue for the base branch, the branch argument is now a no-op

2022-10-01.description: TRACKS will be removed. Follow the ProjectV2 guide at https://github.blog/changelog/2022-06-23-the-new-github-issues-june-23rd-update/, to find a suitable replacement.
2022-10-01.reason: The ProjectNext API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2 API.

Changes are merged into the repository's default branch, the branch argument is now a no-op
The merge queue is locked for the repository's default branch, the branch argument is now a no-op

2022-07-01.reason: PRs are added to the merge queue for the base branch, the branch argument is now a no-op

2021-10-01.description: users will be removed. Use the reactors field instead.
2021-10-01.reason: Reactors can now be mannequins, bots, and organizations.

2021-06-21.reason: DOCKER will be removed from this enum as this type will be migrated to only be used by the Packages REST API.

2021-01-01.description: DRAFT will be removed. Use PullRequest.isDraft instead.
2021-01-01.reason: DRAFT state will be removed from this enum and isDraft should be used instead

2020-10-01.description: timeline will be removed. Use PullRequest.timelineItems instead.
timeline will be removed. Use Issue.timelineItems instead.

2020-01-01.description: user will be removed. Use the assignee field instead.
user will be removed. Use the assignee field instead.

2019-04-01.reason: uploadUrlTemplate is being removed because it is not a standard URL and adds an extra user step.
